title: nI sahAyamulEni
sahitya:
nI sahAyanulEni kOrkelu neravEradamma mAyamma


anupallavi

  bhAsuramagu Adipura vihAri bhavAni tripurasundari gauri


caraNam 1    dhana dhAnyamu galavArikananu dharmacinta galavArikainanu 
ghana padamula jEyuvArikainanu karma niSTa galavArikainanu
    caraNam 2    jagadi nElu maharAjukainanu jaya shIlamugala rautulakainanu 
vigatakAma kOvidulakainanu vinaya bhaktirasa vEdyukainanu
    caraNam 3    vEda shAstra pArINulakainanu vitaraNa guNa vikhyAtulakainanu 
sAdhaka yOga samartulakainanu sabhalu meccu caturulakainanu
    caraNam 4    dalacina pani cEyuvArikainanu tanudA nerigeDi dhanyulainanu 
kula pAvana sadguN nidhikainanu gOpAladAsa varulakainanu
